amendment.description: Amendment mandates that assessment plans required under this Act include analysis of any jobs added or lost as a result of the regulation, differentiating between public and private sector jobs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-60 to mandates that assessment plans required under this Act include analysis of any jobs added or lost as a result of the regulation, differentiating between public and private sector jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
